Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Northbound Reroute near Belmont/Halsted
ShortDescription: Northbound #156 LaSalle buses are temp rerouted via Sheridan, West Sheridan, Pine Grove, Irving Park and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, West Sheridan, Pine Grove, Irving Park and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Halsted.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
